mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mocking_device` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `device_code` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `gb_device_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `gb_channel_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `device_code` (`device_code`), UNIQUE KEY `gb_device_id` (`gb_device_id`,`gb_channel_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
